pages.text: $(thing)Bows$() in $(thing)Minecraft$() are the simplest way to increase your combat flexibility.$(br)With a short-to-moderate draw time, you can launch an $(thing)arrow$() through the air at high speed to hit targets from far away.$(br2)Be aware that different bows have different draw times.
pages.title: Bows

pages.text: While all $(thing)bows$() function in mostly the same way, it's important to note that each bow will have its own slightly different characteristics.$(br2)Some $(thing)bows$() will take more or less time to nock an $(thing)arrow$(), and some will shoot the released $(thing)arrow$() shorter or further away.
$(thing)Bows$() offer the versatility of ranged combat, for a low-cost ammunition tradeoff.
pages.title: A Bow

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)bows$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
